formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Maximum Monthly Payment: Max Payment = (Gross Monthly Income × Max DTI%) - Monthly Debt Payments Maximum Home Price (iterative calculation): Total Monthly PITI = P&I + Property Tax + Insurance + PMI/MIP + HOA Where: • P&I = Principal & Interest payment • Property Tax = (Home Price × Tax Rate) / 12 • Insurance = (Home Price × Insurance Rate) / 12 • PMI = Private Mortgage Insurance (if applicable) • HOA = Homeowners Association fees

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: M = P × [r(1+r)^n] / [(1+r)^n - 1] Where: • M = Monthly payment • P = Principal (loan amount) • r = Monthly interest rate (annual rate / 12 / 100) • n = Total number of payments (years × 12)
